sentences.sContent: This is but one example of what can happen when things go badly wrong.
sentences.sCn: 倒霉的时候就会发生这样的事，这只不过是其中一例。

sentences.sContent: It’s going to be difficult. Anyway, we can but try.
sentences.sCn: 这将会很难，但是无论如何，我们只能试试。

sentences.sContent: We have relationships of many different sorts – with our children, our parents, our boss and our friends, to name but a few.
sentences.sCn: 我们有各式各样的人际关系——和子女的关系、和父母的关系、和老板的关系以及和朋友的关系，这些只是其中的几类。

phrases.pCn: [美国口语]彻底地，完全；狠狠地；有力地；毫无疑问

trans.tranOther: used to connect two statements or phrases when the second one adds something different or seems surprising after the first one
